alert.note: Alert for Carlton, South St. Louis; Southern Cook, North Shore; Southern Lake, North Shore (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 14 at 8:08PM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...LOCALLY DENSE FOG NEAR LAKE SUPERIOR THIS EVENING... Locally dense fog moved into areas near Lake Superior, from Grand Portage to Duluth, MN to Washburn, WI. Visibility is variable from location to location and may be less than 1/4 mile at times. The fog will remain limited to areas within a few miles of the shoreline through late evening, but may expand farther inland later tonight. People traveling Minnesota Highway 61 in the Arrowhead, Interstate 35 near Duluth, the bridges between Duluth and Superior, US Highway 53 between Duluth and Hawthorne, WI, US Highway 2 between Superior and Maple, WI, and Wisconsin Highway 13 between Superior and Ashland should be prepared for changing visibility. Be ready to reduce your speed and increase your following distance. Ensure your headlights are on.

area.areaDesc: Carlton, South St. Louis; Southern Cook, North Shore; Southern Lake, North Shore
